articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Many of the papers have headlined on Iran, following threats from US President Donald Trump.
articles.title: Newspaper headlines: 'Countdown to conflagration' and 'Restore high streets or lose election'

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The average annual household bill in England and Wales will increase by £33 from April.
articles.title: Water bills to rise again: Use our tool to find out by how much

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The four questions you should ask before deciding whether to stay friends or go no contact.
articles.title: Yes, you can be friends with an ex - but there are rules

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Changes to England's school system say on-site suspensions should be used for non-violent behaviour.
articles.title: Do not always send suspended students home, government tells schools

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The US president, who has previously vowed to "rescue" protesters in Iran, says a "massive Armada" is on the way to the country.
articles.title: Trump warns Iran 'time is running out' as US military builds up in Gulf

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: As Trump and the Minneapolis Mayor spar over social media on immigration law enforcement, the US continues to be roiled by the killing of nurse Alex Pretti.
articles.title: Border agents involved in fatal shooting of Alex Pretti in Minneapolis placed on leave

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: State ariline Satena says its aircraft carrying 13 passengers and two crew "suffered a fatal accident".
articles.title: Plane crashes in Colombia, killing all 15 on board

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The industry has "the toughest year in a generation" as vehicle making falls back to 1952 levels.
articles.title: Vehicle production in the UK falls to 73-year low

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Multi-billionaire Elon Musk also announced plans to end production of its Model S and Model X vehicles.
articles.title: Tesla sees first annual revenue drop as it shifts to AI and robots

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: A firm founded by a GP tried to evict 100 people from flats while planning to move asylum seekers in.
articles.title: Millionaire Liverpool GP behind asylum seeker hotels
